meanings.definition: A scientific procedure undertaken to make a discovery, test a hypothesis, or demonstrate a known fact.
meanings.sent1: Scientists conducted experiments to learn more about how plants grow.
meanings.sent2: The students in the science class conducted experiments to understand chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat decided to conduct experiments on how to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a series of experiments, each one revealing a new aspect of her personality.
meanings.sent5: The laboratory was filled with the sounds of bubbling liquids and the excitement of experiments in progress.

meanings.definition: A course of action tentatively adopted without being sure of the outcome.
meanings.sent1: Trying a new study method was an experiment to see if it improved grades.
meanings.sent2: The team's decision to change their strategy was an experiment to see if it would lead to success.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to cook dinner without a recipe turned into a hilarious experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her journey through the unknown city was an experiment in exploration and discovery.
meanings.sent5: The decision to take a different route to work was an experiment that led to unexpected sights and experiences.
